Text: When u say place "pspwxp" to MP_ROOT andthen PSP-folder, do u make a new file named PSP-folder?
Probably means MS_ROOT which means the root of the memory stick. It doesn't really matter where you put the "pspwxp" folder as long as you point the PSP browser to the correct file folder.
